Uses of Class
entities.HUD

Packages that use HUD
Package
Description
backgrounds
 
entities

  • Uses of HUD in backgrounds

    Methods in backgrounds with parameters of type HUD
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    GameOver.update(KeyHandler keys, HUD hud)
    called by gamePanel's method update, manages the movement of the pointer and triggers the setLevel method in gamePanel and hud based on when pressed enter on keyboard
    void
    Password.update(KeyHandler keys, HUD hud)
    called by gamePanel's method update, manages the movement of the pointer and triggers gameOver's method passwordValid when pressed enter and based on the return sets the level

  • Uses of HUD in entities

    Fields in entities declared as HUD
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    (package private) HUD
    Entity.hud
     
    Constructors in entities with parameters of type HUD
    Modifier
    Constructor
    Description
     
    Bomb(GamePanel gamePanel, HUD hud)
    inherits the superconstructor from Entity and sets the kind of entity to bomb
     
    Entity(GamePanel gamePanel, HUD hud)
    super constructor for the bomb, the flames, and the tomb, adds the entity to the list of entities for that level and sets the specific offsets for images display and collider creation
     
    Entity(GamePanel gamePanel, HUD hud, int level)
    Super constructor for the other entities, adds the entity to the list of entities for that level and sets the specific offsets for images display and collider creation
     
    Flames(GamePanel gamePanel, HUD hud, int level)
    inherits superconstructor from Entity, assigns values, loads sprites and creates collider
     
    Player(GamePanel gamePanel, Stage stage, KeyHandler keys, HUD hud, int playerX, int playerY)
    inherits the superconstructor, assign the variables, loads the sprites and creates the bombs and the collider for the player
     
    PowerUp(GamePanel gamePanel, HUD hud, String powerUpType, int level, int x, int y)
    inherits the superconstructor and sets the coordinates, also creates its collider and loads the sprites
     
    Puropen(GamePanel gamePanel, HUD hud, int level, int x, int y)
    inherits the superconstructor, loads the sprites and creates its collider and future tomb
     
    Senshiyan(GamePanel gamePanel, HUD hud, int level, int x, int y)
    inherits the superconstructor, creates the flames and the future tomb, loads all the sprites
     
    Tomb(GamePanel gamePanel, HUD hud, String type, int level, int x, int y, int width, int height)
    inherits the superconstructor, loads the sprites and sets the variables based on the kind of tomb (puropen or senshiyan)
